member.name: T:BinarySearchLib.BinarySearchClass
member.summary: Class contains methods for searching elements in generic array

member.name: M:BinarySearchLib.BinarySearchClass.BinarySearch``1(``0[],``0,System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``0})
member.summary: Searches the sorted generic array for an element using the custom comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element.
member.typeparam: type of elements in the array
member.param: element to find in the array
member.returns: The zero-based index of item in the sorted array, if item is found; otherwise, a negative number -1
